Next Web Cams Check Hotel Rates Blog Dodge the Dunes Social Hub Weddings Groups Venues Sports Accommodations Services Service Request Form Share Hold your next meeting, conference or reunion where the forecast is always sunny! Convenient location in between St. Augustine and Daytona Beach Accommodations for every budget ranging from full service resort, vacation rental homes, condos, limited service hotels, Bed and Breakfast and campgrounds Unique off-site venues- Have your meeting on the beach or with dolphins Diverse dining options- Our restaurants allow you to plan memorable dinners and banquets at unique locations that range from casual to upscale. How We Can Help Each year, Palm Coast and the Flagler Beaches provide many event services in a variety of manners to make your event successful. From partnering with event owners and organizations, to simply assisting with housing or facility needs, we are here to provide support and service. Palm Coast and the Flagler Beaches offer a wide range of assistance not only to attract events to Flagler County, but to ensure their success. We are in the business of making your stay simple, enjoyable and to keep you coming back year after year. We invite you to contact us to discuss funding sources that provide event directors with necessary budget relief, available grants, facility booking, contract negotiations and planning assistance. Palm Coast and the Flagler Beaches will assist you with your preparation and event management needs, Plan Not to Plan! Complimentary Event Service Programs Include: RFP distribution Event planning assistance Qualified meetings may be eligible for discretionary funding Site negotiations Site visits Contract negotiations Familiarization tours Off-site venue recommendations and more Referrals to area restaurants, shopping and attractions Destination literature for all attendees Destination script and images for event registration website (logo’s, photos) TDC rep to welcome group Contact our knowledgeable staff for more detailed information and further assistance or fill out our Groups & Meeting Request form . Amy Lukasik Executive Director alukasik@visitflagler.com Read More Blog (866) 736-9291 Contact Us Privacy Policy Sitemap © 2025 Palm Coast and the Flagler Beaches. All rights reserved. Admitted Students Current Students Families Alumni Counselors Community Members Faculty & Staff Sites and Tools MyFlagler Saints Connect Canvas Academic Catalog Deposit Net Price Calculator Bookstore Proctor Library Parking Portal Planned Giving Mega Menu Footer Resources & Help Center Employee Directory Offices & Services Continuing Education Home About Offices & Services Offices & Services We have all the resources you need to thrive in your new home away from home. Committed teams are ready to help you on your journey. Campus Administrative Divisions Campus Administrative Divisions Office of the President John A. Delaney Flagler College President President's Bio Laura Stevenson Vice President, Chief of Staff LStevenson@flagler.edu Michelle Harbidge Little Executive Administrative Assistant to the President MHarbidge@flagler.edu (904) 819-6288 Academic Affairs We value the development and academic well-being of our students, faculty, and support team. Our services and programs include: Departments and Programs All Academic Departments and Programs Center for Global Education Honors Program Undergraduate Research Flagler CORE Academic Services Academic Access and Success Institutional Research and Effectiveness Office of the Registrar Proctor Library Our Leadership Dr. Arthur Vanden Houten, Vice President of Academic Affairs Dr. Craig Woefel, Dean of Academic Life Hours of Operation Monday- Friday: 8 AM - 5 PM Location President's Wing, Ponce de Leon Hall Business Services The Division of Business Services is the operations arm of Flagler College and oversees the following: Accounting and Finance Budget Planning and Analysis Student Accounts (Bursar) Payroll Parking Facilities Management Risk Management Campus Planning Purchasing and Auxiliaries Leadership Stacey Matthews, Vice President of Business Services Hours of Operation Monday- Friday: 8 AM - 5 PM Location 3rd Floor of the Lightner Museum 75 King Street Contact Us If you have any questions, please visit our business services pages or email us at businessservices@flagler.edu . Enrollment Services Our top priority is to oversee the experience and relationship between Flagler College and prospective students and their families from the point of inquiry through final decision and enrollment. Learn more about what we do by visiting Admission and Aid . Leadership Deborah Thompson, Vice President of Enrollment Services Hours of Operation Monday- Friday: 8 AM - 5 PM Location Hanke Hall Contact Us If you have any questions, email us at admissions@flagler.edu . Institutional Advancement Institutional Advancement's mission is to help support our students, alumni, parents, faculty, staff, and friends by raising money for: Scholarships and Grants Student Life Programs Preservation of Historic Buildings Academic Programming, Faculty Support and Research Sustainability Fund for the Campus New Initiatives Leadership Kristy Myers , Vice President of Institutional Advancement Hours of Operation Monday- Friday: 8 AM - 5 PM Location 170 Malaga Street Contact Us If you have any questions, email us at advancement@flagler.edu or visit our pages . Marketing & Communication We are the connectors on campus, helping divisions and the College meet their marketing and communication goals. Our top priority is elevating the College's image and reputation through best practices. Our services include: Award-winning publications, videos, and other marketing materials Campus brand experiences and strategy Community and government partnerships Communication Lifecycle Journeys Engaging digital and social media Fun and trendy branded merchandise Quality radio programming Revenue-generating programs Student pre-professional opportunities Leadership Carol Branson, Vice President of Marketing and Communication Hours of Operation Monday- Friday: 8 AM - 5 PM Location 3rd Floor, Proctor Library Contact Us Email us at marketing@flagler.edu or visit our pages if you have any questions. Institutional Technology Flagler College's Institutional Technology department prides itself on fast, friendly service. We are here to help students and employees find technology solutions to fit their needs. SERVICES WE PROVIDE Management of campus computers, servers, and printers Management of campus Internet connectivity Management of network & email accounts Troubleshooting dormitory network connectivity Facilitating purchases of technology equipment and software Referral to local technicians for personal computer help Leadership Gwen Pechan, Vice President of Institutional Technology Hours of Operation Monday- Friday: 8 AM - 5 PM Location 3rd and 2nd Floors, Proctor Library Contact Us Email us at support@flagler.edu or visit our pages if you have any questions. Student Affairs The Division of Student Affairs is composed of several departments, working together, to provide programs, services, and experiences for students in social, recreational, and educational ways. Our #1 goal is to create space for learning and engagement outside of the classroom. Our various resources support students as they journey through college on an individualized path through personal development.  We aim to connect impactful experiences to the campus's Core Values and ensure that students have a safe environment as they become leaders and important voices in a global community. From Campus Recreation to our CARE team, we are here to help students have the best possible Flagler experience because in the Division of Student Affairs, “Excellence is our legacy” is not just a slogan; it’s our call to action. Follow us on social media Instagram Facebook Stay connected through Saints Connect Find out about events taking place on and off campus. Saints Connect Leadership Everett Malcolm, Vice President of Student Affairs Hours of Operation Monday- Friday: 8 AM - 5 PM Location Ringhaver Student Center Contact Us Email us at studentaffairs@flagler.edu or visit our pages if you have any questions. Intercollegiate Athletics At Flagler, winning is not defined simply by a final score. It is shaped by the values we practice: accountability, integrity, professionalism, sportsmanship, and teamwork. Our student-athletes are excelling year-round, on the field and off. Flagler Sports The college competes in 14 varsity sports in Division II of the NCAA and is a six-time recipient of the Peach Belt Conference Institution of the Year Sportsmanship Award. Flagler College Athletics Website Leadership Judd Damon, Athletics Director Hours of Operation Monday- Friday: 8 AM - 5 PM Location Lightner Museum Contact Us Email us at athletics@flagler.edu if you have any questions. Human Resources The Division of Human Resources strives to support our students, faculty members, administrative professionals, and support staff so they may succeed in reaching their full potential. We are committed to facilitating the trailblazing spirit of the Flagler College community through our servant leadership philosophy. We provide an environment that challenges students to pursue higher learning, exercise exemplary citizenship, and adhere to ethical standards.  We continually work to grow as a college and engage with the St. Augustine community. Leadership Kelly Toaston, VP, Chief Human Resources Officer Hours of Operation Monday- Friday: 8 AM - 5 PM Location Lightner Museum Contact Us Email us at humanresources@flagler.edu or visit our Human Resources , or Title IX pages if you have any questions × Back to top Home Contact Us 74 King Street, St. Augustine, FL 32084 (904) 829-6481 admissions@flagler.edu Directions & Parking 74 King Street, St. Augustine, FL 32084 (904) 829-6481 admissions@flagler.edu Directions & Parking Connect With Us Facebook Instagram Twitter Youtube Tiktok Newsletter Social Footer Facebook Instagram Twitter Youtube Tiktok Newsletter Flager Forward Popular Searches Degrees & Programs Living on Campus Take a Virtual Tour News & Events Graduate and Education Programs Popular Searches Degrees & Programs Living on Campus Take a Virtual Tour News & Events Graduate and Education Programs Let Us Help You Resources & Help Center Contact Employee Directory Careers Questions & Comments Let Us Help You Resources & Help Center Contact Employee Directory Careers Questions & Comments Flagler Forward Legal Footer © 2025 Flagler College. Mark Your Calendar Register Today Upcoming Events View Chamber Calendar Join Us As We Grow Your Future When you engage with the Palm Coast-Flagler Regional Chamber, you’re not just gaining access to valuable programs, events, and connections — you’re becoming part of a regional effort to strengthen our economy, grow jobs, and create lasting impact. Your investment and involvement empower the Chamber to advocate for business-friendly policies, provide relevant education, and unite the community around key opportunities. Now is the time to lead, connect, and make a difference — for your business and for Flagler County. Membership Benefits Welcome New Members Ready To Become A Member? Experience Flagler College Experience Flagler College Take in Gilded Age architecture and experience what media outlets worldwide call one of the most beautiful campuses in the country . While you're here, enjoy all that sunny, coastal St. Augustine has to offer — from the walkable historic downtown to miles upon miles of pristine beaches. Virtual Tour Virtual Tour Launch Experience Upcoming Events Upcoming Events Campus Visit Day (October 18, 2025) Designed for prospective high school and transfer students, our open house event will give you the opportunity to gain an insider's look at the admission & financial aid process, meet our esteemed faculty, explore campus with Student Ambassadors, and dine in our fabulous Dining Hall! Register Now Daily Visit Experiences Daily Visit Experiences Information Session and Tour Mondays-Fridays This two-hour in-person visit experience is open to both prospective and admitted students and their families. Learn more about Flagler College and the admission process from our admissions staff, followed by an informative campus tour with our Student Ambassadors. *For registration purposes, Firefox and Safari are preferred internet browsers* Register Now Pardon our Dust Throughout the 2024-2025 academic year, Flagler College will be completing very exciting renovations across campus. While the Office of Admissions is offering visits during this time, please note that our tour route may vary based on the construction locations. Regardless, here are some great tips for enjoying your visit. Group Visit Experiences Group Visit Experiences Mondays-Thursdays Designed to introduce college-readiness middle school programs, high school field trips, and community/state college groups of 10-50 students to our campus. Group Visit Experiences can vary depending on the size of the group and the date of the visit, and takes approximately two hours. Group Visit Experiences are offered during the specified dates below: 2025-2026 Academic Year Semester Dates Fall Semester September 15-November 20 Spring Semester February 2-April 9 Summer A Semester May 18-June 18 Please note: If you are looking to book a Group Visit Experience outside of our specified times above, please email visit@flagler.edu before submitting the request form below. Request a Group Visit Experience Now Travel Information Travel Information We invite you to explore Flagler College and have provided information on traveling to our campus below. As you plan your trip, please contact visit@flagler.edu with any questions you may have. Travel Information Questions about tours? Questions? We're here to help. If you are a prospective student and have questions about admissions visit experiences, please click the "Admissions Visits" button to email us. Or, give us a call at 904-819-6220. If you are looking for information about our Historic Tours of the former Hotel Ponce de Leon, please click the "Historic Tours" button.
